section.heading: When Filed.
section.text: A document is filed with the Board when it is received by the Executive Director or the Executive Director’s designee via mail, email, or personal delivery.

para.text: All filings and other communications with the Board shall be addressed to the Maryland Public Employee Relations Board.
Means of contacting the Board can be found on its website.

annotations.annotation: State Government Article, §22-306(e), Annotated Code of Maryland
